    Fitting a VAST Model Preparing a Stream Network

    ConstructStreamVAST This function constructs objects with class "StreamVAST". Depending on the arguments supplied, it will either initialize the object from countdata and reachdata, or it will add details to an already defined StreamVAST object.

    ConstructStreamVAST.Rd

    ConstructStreamVAST This function constructs objects with class "StreamVAST". Depending on the arguments supplied, it will either initialize the object from countdata and reachdata, or it will add details to an already defined StreamVAST object.

    Usage

    ConstructStreamVAST(
  countdata,
  reachdata,
  surveydata,
  vastdata,
  vastmodel,
  countname,
  reachname,
  timetable,
  timescale,
  timerange,
  title,
  stats,
  preds,
  eval,
  spacedata,
  timedata,
  aucdata,
  unitconv,
  covariates
)

    Arguments

    countdata

    A dataframe containing count data, such as outputed from AssembleReddData

    reachdata

    A sf object with data for reaches, such as from AssignReaches

    surveydata

    A optional data frame or sf object with survey information, such as from MakeSurveyTracks, doesn't do much right now

    vastdata

    A dataframe formatted specifically for use with VAST

    vastmodel

    A fitted VAST model

    countname

    A column name from countdata to use

    reachname

    a column name from reachdata to use

    timetable

    a dataframe converting timesteps to dates

    timescale

    The temporal resolution

    timerange

    A length two vector with the start and enddate for the temporal

    title

    A title or name for the stream system, use for plotting

    stats

    A list with summary stats, like RMSE,AIC

    preds

    A dataframe of all predictions from the VAST model

    eval

    A limited dataframe for evaluating model performance

    spacedata

    A dataframe with results aggregated by spatial frame

    timedata

    A dataframe with results aggregated by time frame

    aucdata

    a dataframe with Area under the Curve calculations derived from model

    covariates

    a list with elements for the covariates

    StreamVAST

    An StreamVAST object to append details

    vastinput

    A dataframe with spatial information for VAST, requires a specific format

    vastnetwork

    A dataframe with spatial information for VAST's stream functionality

    vastnetworkLL

    A dataframe with spatial information needed for VAST's stream functionality

    vastsettings

    a list of settings used to run a vast model

    Value

    A streamvast object with appropriate formatting

    On this page
